backend/main.mo: Defines types and a Motoko actor providing query endpoints for games, craftable items, categories, and update status using in‑memory Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/docs/publish-to-production.md: Documentation describing the promotion‑only process for publishing a draft build to production with pre‑publish checks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for themes and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the SPA with deep‑link restoration logic using sessionStorage.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that captures the original path and redirects to root to enable deep‑link handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, query client, layout, routes, and deep‑link restoration for the SPA.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable UI component showing a basic empty‑state message with optional icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright, caffeine.ai attribution, and a diagnostics link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with app logo, title, and a home button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor with identity‑aware initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductionPrefligh: Runs one‑time backend connectivity checks on mount and records structured results in the preflight diagnostics store.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching games, catalog data, items, and update statuses with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a paper‑themed light and dark UI with subtle texture effects.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/collectFron: Collects runtime, environment, build, and preflight diagnostic data into a structured object and supports formatting it for clipboard copying.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, mounting it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Displays system and preflight diagnostics with copy‑to‑clipboard support and UI badges for method results and statuses.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailPage.tsx: Page that loads and displays catalog and crafting game details, filters items by category and search, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/GameSearchPage.tsx: Game library search page that fetches catalog games, provides a search bar, and renders results with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Item detail page that loads a specific game's item, shows its metadata and required materials, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/state/preflightDiagnosticsS: Zustand store managing preflight diagnostic state with methods for running, skipping, completing, and resetting checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, versioning, notes, and feature request tracking.
